pets.name: Silvia
pets.info: Neutered, House-trained, Shots up to date
pets.story: Silvia was rescued outside as a pregnant stray. She had 4 kittens the next day!  Silvia is very sweet and has a gentle personality.

pets.name: Buddy
pets.story: Buddy is very playful and loves spending time with the other puppies in the play yard!  He likes people, too. Buddy, has a fine temperament, and heâ€™s great to have around!

pets.name: Charlie
pets.story: Charlie loves being outside playing with other dogs, and he enjoys being with people, too.  Add to all this her great temperament, and you have a wonderful dog!

pets.name: Chloe
pets.story: Meet Chloe! This pretty lady is sweet but very nervous and is looking for a calm home with no kids or other animals. Chloe is on some meds for her anxiety,but has been very sweet meeting people at the shelter.

pets.name: Coda
pets.story: Meet Coda, like many Huskies, this handsome boy has size, strength and boundless energy and has proven to be too much dog for some prior owners. Coda needs an active home to burn some energy and keep him occupied.

pets.name: Bella
pets.story: Bella loves a fenced in yard to explore and good on a leash. She likes to play with toys, be with her people to cuddle and lay on their lap!
